Hero.label: For developers, by developers
Hero.title: Share your bugs, memes and code tips.
Hero.description: Nerd Feed is the social network for programmers: a space to share ideas, epic bugs, and quick tips.

About.title: What makes Nerd Feed unique
About.description: Nerd Feed is more than just posts. It’s a simple, fast, and fun way for developers to connect, share, and build their identity.

cards.label: Community
cards.title: Connect with other developers
cards.description: Join a feed where programmers from all levels share insights, challenges, and wins in real time.

cards.label: Simplicity
cards.title: Post in seconds
cards.description: Write and share your thoughts, bugs, or memes in under 280 characters. No distractions, just code talk.

cards.label: Identity
cards.title: Build your dev profile
cards.description: Show who you are: customize your profile, share your posts, and let others follow your coding journey.

PostPage.title: Start posting, tell us a joke or a bug
PostPage.placeholder: The perfect bug: It only reproduces on the QA team.

RegisterPage.title: Sign Up
RegisterPage.content: We´ll get you up and running so you can verify your personal information and customize your account.

LoginPage.title: Sign In
LoginPage.content: We´ll get you up and running so you can verify your personal information and customize your account.
